pluginstrument.author: Simstrumentation
pluginstrument.description:
Made by SIMSTRUMENTATION "EXTERMINATE THE MICE FROM YOUR COCKPIT!" GitHub: https://github.com/simstrumentation
Left and right fuel valves for the Daher Kodiak
NOTE: toggle the switches by touching / clicking on the black detent nubs
V1.0 - Released 2022-12-23 V1.01 - Released 2022-12-31 - fixed an issue where under certain conditions, the left lever animation to the OFF position wouldn't work.
KNOWN ISSUES: - None
